main_definition: The National Hockey League (NHL) is a professional ice hockey league composed of teams from North America, considered the premier men's ice hockey league globally.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An abbreviation for the National Hockey League
meanings_and_examples.example: The NHL season starts in October and ends in June.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A term used to describe something related to ice hockey, especially professional or high-level competitions
meanings_and_examples.example: The Olympic Games features top athletes from around the world competing for medals in various disciplines, including NHL players participating in demonstration events.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A casual nickname used by fans of hockey or those familiar with professional ice hockey
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm a huge NHL fan and I can watch every game on TV!
